text: Van Alexander (born Alexander Van Vliet Feldman, May 2, 1915 â€“ July 19, 2015) was an American bandleader, arranger and composer. He was known for his song "A-Tisket, A-Tasket". He also performed music on television. Alexander won several Emmy Awards for his television scores. Alexander turned 100 in May 2015 and died on July 19, 2015 of heart failure in Los Angeles.Van Alexander Dies at 100 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:American Emmy Award winners Category:1915 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American composers Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Van Alexander
